forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 11pm and 5am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the dawn light unfurls across Downtown San Francisco, a delicate balance of shifting weather teases the early morning. The air carries a promise of warmth, with today’s high nudging the mid-60s, yet the comfortable breeze curates a softness that evokes a sense of calm and clarity. A gentle whisper of drizzle may make a fleeting appearance before eleven, but the clouds will gradually recede, giving way to mostly sunny skies with the kind of light that dances on the buildings and glints off the bay.

The marine layer, that familiar San Francisco companion, holds its ground for now but will likely retreat, showcasing not only the iconic Golden Gate but also the whimsical shapes of the city’s skyline. Tonight brings a familiar murmur of clouds and a hint of moisture, the evenings promising the fresh scent of salt and mist. Dressed in layers, one might choose a light jacket that can be shed as the sun arcs higher, perhaps complementing the ensemble with comfortable shoes for a leisurely stroll. The morning is an invitation to explore the city’s hidden nooks or to sip a warm coffee while observing the world come alive.

A walk along the waterfront would be splendid, allowing one to soak in the atmosphere while the city awakens around you. Take a moment at a cozy café, the warmth of the beverage contrasting with a refreshing breeze that speaks of the ocean just beyond view. Today promises a blend of clarity and comfort, a quintessential day in the life of this vibrant city, inviting all to experience its subtle beauty.
